json.text: Hi there! This is Mark from MarkTeacher.com with another high band IELTS

example answer. This IELTS question is
about art. What types of art to people in

your country like? I think lots of
different types of are very popular

throughout the UK. Modern Art seems to
be the latest trend, especially in London,

there's a museum called the Tate Modern,
which usually features different

installations and exhibits from modern
artists. A lot of the exhibits and works

of art themselves are quite abstract and
they're quite difficult to understand,

but nevertheless they're still very very
popular. Visitors from the UK and abroad

love to show up and take pictures of all
the latest exhibits and then debate the

meaning - what the artwork represents or
what it symbolizes and things like that.

Performing arts are also very popular.
The West End in London has daily

showings of some of the most famous and
longest-running musicals like Les Miserables, and Wicked is now incredibly
popular, so I would pick those two as the
most popular forms of art in the UK.

Check out MarkTeacher.com for more
IELTS courses lessons and tips!
